Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Alteration
Important Commands: alter
{? equal | $(theatre:id) | IC | Syntax: "alter my plain tunic 'material tweed'"
The alteration system allows you to alter plain clothes and other plain items, turning them into beautiful, well-fitted, and personalized objects.
There are numerous skills, each of which uses a different verb. The complete list of alterations includes: Bookbinding ($(udat.chatchar)BIND), Cobbling ($(udat.chatchar)COBBLE), Dying ($(udat.chatchar)DYE), Embossing ($(udat.chatchar)EMBOSS), Embroidering ($(udat.chatchar)EMBROIDER), Engraving ($(udat.chatchar)ENGRAVE), Gloving ($(udat.chatchar)ALTER), Hatting ($(udat.chatchar)ALTER), Jeweling ($(udat.chatchar)ADORN), Tailoring ($(udat.chatchar)TAILOR), and Weaponsmithing ($(udat.chatchar)FORGE). The verb $(udat.chatchar)ALTER may also always be used to change the most important aspects of an item.
{? | $(configd.textif:chatmode) | In Chat Theatres, all characters have been given Master skills in alteration, which will allow you to do extensive modifications to any plain objects. | {? equal | $(theatre.gameid) | Marrach |The skills of alteration are as carefully kept as all other secrets in the Castle. You will need to seek out teachers and convince them of the value of teaching you in order to become skilled at the Alterations.} }
See Also: Clothing, Seamstress, Tailor
| The alteration/crafting helpnodes will be forthcoming shortly. }
